title: What is a good way to start a chapter? - Writing & Blogging - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re trying to begin a chapter, especially the first, then I highly recommend thinking of it as a hip hop flow. Pretend that you’re writing rap because that’s how I began my novel. This question reciprocates with me because I’ve forgotten what got me started with my writing! I became too focused on prose, rather than the literal impacts of free verse.
